data.name: Value Home Loan
data.description: Helping Police Officers with a low rate home loan that has a great range of features to help pay off your home sooner.

features.additionalInfo: Up to $5,000 over the Fixed Term period
Not Available for Fixed Loans or Interest Only

eligibility.additionalInfo: Police Value Home Loan only available to current serving Police Officers or a Retired Police Officer(s) who are a member of a Union that is associated with the Police Federation of Australia. This includes NSW Police Association (including Associate members), and the Australian Federal Police Association.

fees.name: Additional Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request an additional statement

fees.name: RTGS Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we are required to transfer settlement funds to an agent on behalf of our Solicitor.

fees.name: General Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask for our consent to any matter relating to a loan contract or security (other than a matter for which a separate fee is payable).

fees.name: Third Party Costs
fees.additionalInfo:
Any other costs charged to us by a third party will be passed on to you. Some examples are as follows:
• Title Change Fee
• Land and Property Information Search Fees
• Land and Property Information Registration Fees

fees.name: Substituting of Security Legal fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us when you substitute an existing property with a new property as security for your home loan.

fees.name: Mortgage Loan Top up/Increase in Credit Limit Fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable on application or funding. Applies to all Home Loan Applications

fees.name: Early Repayment Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Early Repayment Fee payable, if, during any fixed rate period, you:
(a)	repay the whole of your unpaid balance (full early repayment);
(b)	pay $5000 or more in repayments above the contractual repayments (partial early repayment); or
(c)	become obliged to repay the whole loan after you have defaulted (full early repayment)

and the fixed rate that applied to the loan is more than the prevailing market interest rate at the time of the early repayment, as determined by us in our absolute discretion.

fees.name: Dishonoured Cheque fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable when a cheque or other payment to your account is dishonoured.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we send you a default notice under a loan contract when an arrears remains unremedied after we have sent you an arrears letter.

fees.name: Consent to Subdivision Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask for our consent to register a subdivision or other plan or dealing.

fees.name: Arrears Letter Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we send you an arrears letter asking you to remedy an arrears under a loan contract.

fees.name: Second Mortgage Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to consent to a second mortgage

fees.name: Late Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged where the whole or any part of your loan repayment remains unpaid after 14 days past the due date. Applies to all Heritage Isle Bank  loans and continuing credit accounts

fees.name: Production of Title Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to our solicitors when you ask us to produce the certificate of title of your property to enable registration of a plan or any document dealing with your property

fees.name: Issue of Statutory Default Notice Legal Fees
Substituting Securities fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us when you substitute an existing property with a new property as security for your home loan.

fees.name: Mortgage Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask us to prepare a discharge of mortgage. Note: This fee does not include registration costs for the land titles office

fees.name: Monthly Product Split Fee
fees.additionalValue: $7 per additional product per month during the period of the split, debited to the account for the other product each month.

fees.name: Future Legal Costs and Disbursements Relating to any Variations, Dealings, Discharges
